import React from 'react'; import ProfileCarousel from '../components/Design/ProfileCarousel' import { Container } from 'react-bootstrap' import Web from '../assets/images/Backgrounds/pedroLastaArches.jpg' import Mobile from '../assets/images/Backgrounds/IanChenArches.jpg' const homeBackground = window.innerWidth >= 650 ? Web : Mobile; const Home = () => { // const homeBackground = window.innerWidth >= 650 ? Web : Mobile; return(

Full Stack Web Developer with a background in business aiming to bridge user experience with client needs.

My name is Steven Mann, an aspiring web developer in Houston, TX, proficient in several technolgoies including: Javascript, JQuery, React, MySQl and Node.js. Experience building, designing and styling personal websites using various languages and tools like HTML, CSS, JQuery to design fully functional web platforms. Passionate about merging functionality with creativity in a high pressure environment. In previous work experience, I was able to utilize and merge client inventory into a proprietary application, giving the client the ability to view, order and maintain inventory. Versed in collaborative work environments to ensure optimal results for user-centered designs.

When I am not working on my career, I enjoy writing, recording and performing music across the state of Texas. I perform in several local bands and enjoy playing genres from country and americana to blues and rock. I have opened for acts such as Kyle Hollingsworth, Dumpstafunk, Naughty Professor, George Porter Jr., Organ Freeman and The Texas Gentlemen. I also enjoy outdoor activities such as biking, fishing, and camping. On my most recent camping trip, I traveled to Lost Maples just outside of San Antonio, spending four days and nights in the remote Texas hillcountry.
) } const styles ={ wallpaper: { height: '100vh', backgroundSize: 'cover', backgroundRepeat: 'no-repeat', backgroundPosition: 'top center' }, brand: { fontStyle: 'italic', }, } export default Home;
